top_categories.workout_context: Gravelista rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Gravelista’s victorian rolling, australian gravel demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Racing Gravelista isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Gravelista. Make this intensity feel like home.
At 80 miles, Gravelista punishes athletes who haven’t trained their body to produce power when glycogen runs low.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Gravelista when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
Gravelista’s victorian rolling gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at Gravelista — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
The Norwegian double-threshold method builds the sustained power base for Gravelista — massive training stimulus without the recovery cost of VO2max work.
Blended sessions combine endurance with intensity spikes — exactly what Gravelista’s victorian rolling gravel delivers on race day.
Gravelista’s 5,000ft of climbing demands seated and standing versatility — the ability to change climbing style as gradient and fatigue dictate.
Short, violent efforts are unavoidable at Gravelista — climbs demanding 2-minute maximal efforts, surges to close gaps, attacks on victorian rolling gravel.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 60–80g carbs/hour for Gravelista’s 80 miles. Start fueling within the first 30 minutes — early fueling prevents late-race collapse. Bonking at mile 60 is a nutrition failure, not a fitness failure.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Gravelista requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on victorian rolling gravel to build confidence. Expect: victorian rolling, australian gravel, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Gravel Specific, and Race Simulation to prepare you for 80 miles of victorian rolling gravel in Victoria, Australia.
